thread.section_title: Mainely Urns Reviews | Customer Service Reviews of Mainely Urns | mainelyurns.com | 2 of 63
thread.title: Millie

author: Millie
title: Millie
text: I recently purchased the Aria Wheat urn for my husbands memorial. It is beautiful. It arrived well packed in a timely manner and in perfect condition. The engraving is beautifully done. We are very pleased with the quality and craftsmanship. The staff was very kind and pleasant to work with and sent us a final draft of the engraving for approval. Thank you very much.
